00034 using namespace Hypertable;
00035 using namespace Hypertable::Config;

00040 TimerHandler::TimerHandler(Comm *comm, RangeServer *range_server)
00041   : m_comm(comm), m_range_server(range_server),
00042     m_urgent_maintenance_scheduled(false), m_app_queue_paused(false),
00043     m_maintenance_outstanding(false) {
00044   int error;
00045   int32_t maintenance_interval;
00046 
00047   m_timer_interval = get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.Timer.Interval");
00048   maintenance_interval = get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.Maintenance.Interval");
00049 
00050   if (m_timer_interval > (maintenance_interval+10)) {
00051     m_timer_interval = maintenance_interval + 10;
00052     HT_INFOF("Reducing timer interval to %d to support maintenance interval %d",
00053              m_timer_interval, maintenance_interval);
00054   }
00055 
00056   m_current_interval = m_timer_interval;
00057 
00058   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_maintenance, TIME_UTC);
00059 
00060   m_app_queue = m_range_server->get_application_queue();
00061 
00062   range_server->register_timer(this);
00063   
00064   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(0, this)) != Error::OK)
00065     HT_FATALF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00066 
00067   return;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 void TimerHandler::schedule_maintenance() {
00072   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00073 
00074   if (!m_urgent_maintenance_scheduled && !m_maintenance_outstanding) {
00075     boost::xtime now;
00076     boost::xtime_get(&now, TIME_UTC);
00077     uint64_t elapsed = xtime_diff_millis(m_last_maintenance, now);
00078     int error;
00079     uint32_t millis = (elapsed < 1000) ? 1000 - elapsed : 0;
00080     HT_INFOF("Scheduling urgent maintenance for %u millis in the future", millis);
00081     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(millis, this)) != Error::OK)
00082       HT_FATALF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00083     m_urgent_maintenance_scheduled = true;
00084   }
00085   return;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void TimerHandler::complete_maintenance_notify() {
00090   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00091   m_maintenance_outstanding = false;
00092   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_maintenance, TIME_UTC);
00093 }

00100 void TimerHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00101   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00102   int error;
00103   int64_t memory_used = Global::memory_tracker.balance();
00104 
00105   if (memory_used > Global::memory_limit) {
00106     m_current_interval = 500;
00107     if (!m_app_queue_paused) {
00108       HT_INFO("Pausing application queue due to low memory condition");
00109       m_app_queue_paused = true;
00110       m_app_queue->stop();
00111     }
00112   }
00113   else {
00114     if (m_app_queue_paused) {
00115       HT_INFO("Restarting application queue");
00116       m_app_queue->start();
00117       m_app_queue_paused = false;
00118     }
00119     if (m_current_interval < m_timer_interval)
00120       m_current_interval = std::min(m_current_interval*2, m_timer_interval);
00121   }
00122 
00123   try {
00124 
00125     if (event_ptr->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00126 
00127       if (!m_maintenance_outstanding) {
00128         m_app_queue->add( new RequestHandlerDoMaintenance(m_comm, m_range_server) );
00129         m_maintenance_outstanding = true;
00130       }
00131 
00132       if (m_urgent_maintenance_scheduled)
00133         m_urgent_maintenance_scheduled = false;
00134       else {
00135         //HT_INFOF("About to reset timer to %u millis in the future", m_current_interval);
00136         if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_current_interval, this)) != Error::OK)
00137           HT_FATALF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00138       }
00139     }
00140     else
00141       HT_ERRORF("Unexpected event - %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00142   }
00143   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00144     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00145   }
00146 }
